p: Our previous result [ 14] and other reports [ 20, 32] demonstrated a reduction in protease and pigment production in the yjbI and yjbH gene-disrupted mutants. We obtained consistent results in this study ( Figure 3(a,b)), and the protease and pigment production were restored by complementation of yjbI::Tn and yjbH::Tn with the yjbIH operon or the yjbH gene alone, but not with the yjbI gene ( Figure 3(a,b)).
